bg.comment: The background color of the Stepper.

breakpoint.comment: The minimum width at which the Stepper switches between narrow and wide layouts.

max-width.comment: The maximum width of the Stepper.

width.comment: The border width of the Stepper icons.

color.comment: The color of the border around the Stepper icon.

color-selected.comment: The color of the step icon when the step is selected in the Stepper.

color-selected-dark-bg.comment: The color of the step icon in front of a dark background when the step is selected in the Stepper.

height.comment: The height of the step icon in the Stepper.

width.comment: The width of the step icon in the Stepper.

color.comment: The color of the step icon in the Stepper.

color-hover.comment: The color of the step icon in the Stepper when hovered.

color-selected.comment: The color of the Stepper step icon when the step is selected.

transition.comment: The transition of the Stepper step icon.

z-index.comment: The z-index of the Stepper step icon.

selected-spread.comment: The spread value of the icon box shadow when the Stepper step is selected.

selected.comment: The box shadow of the Stepper step icon when the icon is selected.

selected-dark-bg.comment: The box shadow of the Stepper step icon on a dark background when the icon is selected.

diameter.comment: The diameter of the step icon in the Stepper.

radius.comment: The radius of the step icon in the Stepper.

left.comment: The left setting of the step icon in the Stepper.

border-color.comment: The color of the icon border when the Stepper is on a dark background (sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg).

color.comment: The color of the step icon when the Stepper has a dark background (sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg).

color-selected.comment: The color of the Stepper step icon when the step is selected and the Stepper has a dark background (sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg).

color-hover.comment: The color of the step icon on hover when the Stepper has a dark background (sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg).

bg.comment: The background color of the content in the Stepper step.

bg-selected.comment: The background color of the Stepper step content box when the step is selected.

margin-left.comment: The margin-left of the content in the Stepper step.

border-radius.comment: The border radius of the Stepper step content box when it has a description.

box-shadow.comment: The box shadow of the Stepper step content box when it has a description.

top-spacing.comment: The spacing between the Stepper step heading and description.

bg-selected.comment: The background color of the Stepper step content box when it has a description and when the step is selected.

font-weight.comment: The font weight of the Stepper step heading.

size.comment: The font size of the Stepper step heading.

color.comment: The color of the Stepper step heading.

color-selected.comment: The color of the Stepper step heading when the step is selected.

padding.comment: The padding value for the Stepper step.

heading-color.comment: The color of the Stepper step heading when the Stepper is on a dark background (sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg).

description-selected.comment: The text color of a selected Stepper step's content and header when it has a description. This applies to steppers with the sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg class.

color.comment: The color of the bar that connects the steps in the Stepper.

width.comment: The width of the bar that connects the steps in the Stepper.

left-inset.comment: The left inset of the bar that connects the steps in the Stepper.

color.comment: The color of the bar that connects the steps when the Stepper is on a dark background (sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg).

slide-timing.comment: The timing setting for the slides of the Stepper.

timing.comment: The text fade in timing for the Stepper.

delay.comment: The text fade in delay for the Stepper.
